GR14yamcatau:0: kāntas te puruṣottamaḥ phaṇi-patiḥ śayyā4sanaṃ vāhanaṃ vedā3tmā
GR14yamcatau:2: brahmā3di-sura-vrajaḥ sadayitas tvad-dāsa-dāsī-gaṇaḥ śrīr ity eva ca nāma te bhagavati ! brūmaḥ kathaṃ tvāṃ vayam || YCs_1 ||
GR14yamcatau:3: yasyās te mahimānam ātmana iva tvad-vallabho 'pi prabhur nālaṃ mātum
GR14yamcatau:5: tām tvāṃ dāsa iti, prapanna iti ca stoṣyāmy ahaṃ nirbhayo lokai1ke3śvari
GR14yamcatau:6: loka-nātha-dayite dānte dayāṃ te vidan || YCs_2 ||
GR14yamcatau:11: śāntā1nanta-mahā-vibhūti paraṃ yad brahma rūpaṃ harer mūrtaṃ brahma tato 'pi tat priyataraṃ rūpaṃ yad atyadbhutam |
GR14yamcatau:12: yāny anyāni yathā-sukhaṃ viharato rūpāṇi sarvāṇi tāny āhuḥ svair
